description: BithAI is an all-in-one free video editor to take your content to the next level. Create, edit, and publish videos in minutes.
title: Bith.ai  | Content Creation Made Easy
introduction: BithAI is an all-in-one free video editor designed to elevate your content creation. It offers a range of features to convert, edit, and enhance videos for various social media platforms.
features: Magic resizer to convert videos to different formats
Generate stunning images through text using AI
Cloud-based for easy access and processing
targetPeople: Content creators, both newbies and professionals
pricing: Subscription with monthly and annual billing options

faqs.question: Can I cancel my pro plan at anytime I want?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your pro plan at any time. You can also switch to a different plan or downgrade to a free plan from within your Billing Settings. No refunds are offered for paid plans.

faqs.question: What are my payment options?
faqs.answer: Payment can be made by credit/debit card or PayPal. For any questions about payment options, contact the support team.

faqs.question: Do you have an annual/yearly billing option?
faqs.answer: Yes, an annual billing option is available, offering up to 17% savings compared to monthly payments.

faqs.question: Can I have a free trial for Pro Plan?
faqs.answer: No, a free trial for the Pro Plan is not available at this time.
